import React from 'react'; import StripeCheckoutButton from '../../components/stripe-button/stripe-button.component'; import CheckoutItemContainer from "../../components/checkout-item/checkout-item.container"; import { CheckoutPageContainer, CheckoutHeaderContainer, HeaderBlockContainer, TotalContainer, WarningContainer } from './checkout.styles'; const CheckoutPage = ({ cartItems, total }) => ( Product Description Quantity Price Remove {cartItems.map(cartItem => ( ))} TOTAL: ${total} *Please use the following test credit card for payments*
4242 4242 4242 4242 - Exp: 01/20 - CVV: 123 ); export default CheckoutPage;
